00034 ultimix.report.CreateFrame = function( PackageName , PackageVersion , ReportName , Data )
00035 {
00036       if( jQuery( '#report_generation_id' ).length )
00037       {
00038             jQuery( '#report_generation_id' ).remove();
00039       }
00040 
00041       var         ReportGenerationParameters = '';
00042       if( !Data )
00043       {
00044             Data = {};
00045       }
00046       for( i in Data )
00047       {
00048             ReportGenerationParameters = '&' + i + "=" + new String( Data[ i ] ) + ReportGenerationParameters;
00049       }
00050       
00051       IFrameCode = '<iframe id="report_generation_id" style="display: none;" src="./report.html?report_package_name=';
00052       IFrameCode = IFrameCode + PackageName + '&report_package_version=' + PackageVersion;
00053       IFrameCode = IFrameCode + '&report_name=' + ReportName + '&' + ( new Date() ).getTime();
00054       IFrameCode = IFrameCode + ReportGenerationParameters + '"></iframe>';
00055       jQuery( 'body' ).append( IFrameCode );
00056 }

00067 ultimix.report.ReportGenerationProcess = function( OnGenerate , ShowProgress )
00068 {
00069       if( ShowProgress )
00070       {
00071             var               LoadingId = ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( 
00072                                     ultimix.get_string( 'report_is_generating' ) , 
00073                                     ultimix.get_string( 'report' ) , 
00074                                     ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING 
00075             );
00076       }
00077       
00078       jQuery( '#report_generation_id' ).load(
00079             function()
00080             {
00081                   if( ShowProgress )
00082                   {
00083                         ultimix.std_dialogs.CloseMessageBox( LoadingId );
00084                   }
00085                   if( OnGenerate )
00086                   {
00087                         OnGenerate();
00088                   }
00089             }
00090       );
00091 }

00110 ultimix.report.GenerateReport = function( PackageName , PackageVersion , ReportName , Data , OnGenerate , ShowProgress )
00111 {
00112       ultimix.report.CreateFrame( PackageName , PackageVersion , ReportName , Data );
00113       
00114       ultimix.report.ReportGenerationProcess( OnGenerate , ShowProgress );
00115 }

00129 {
00130       var               PackageName = jQuery( DataSource ).find( 'span.package_name' ).html();
00131       var               PackageVersion = jQuery( DataSource ).find( 'span.package_version' ).html();
00132       var               ReportName = jQuery( DataSource ).find( 'span.report_name' ).html();
